description_html: Part of the Symphony Collection, a series of smooth ceilings with design flexibility, Symphony® m is a mineral fiber panel which provides excellent sound absorption (up to NRC 0.75) and noise blocking (33-41) plus washability. Its smooth visual coupled with superior finish provides exceptional durability and outstanding cleanability in several verticals including healthcare, offices and school settings. Symphony m exceeds FGI Guidelines for cleanability and acoustic performance in healthcare applications and is a certified clean room component to ISO Class 4 (highest among comparable products). This mineral fiber panel can be combined with Symphony, Adagio®, and Tufcore™ to provide matching visuals with differing acoustic performance within the same space.
